meanings.definition: The state of being excessively fat or obese.
meanings.sent1: Her adiposity made it difficult for her to move comfortably.
meanings.sent2: The doctor warned him about the risks associated with his adiposity.
meanings.sent3: Despite his adiposity, he still managed to dance at the party.
meanings.sent4: The mountain of desserts on the table was a symbol of adiposity.
meanings.sent5: The adiposity of the bear in the story emphasized its laziness.

meanings.definition: Excessive accumulation of fat in the body.
meanings.sent1: The adiposity around his waist was a result of poor eating habits.
meanings.sent2: Regular exercise can help reduce adiposity in the abdomen.
meanings.sent3: The adiposity in the fridge tempted him late at night.
meanings.sent4: The adiposity of the clouds darkened the sky before the storm.
meanings.sent5: The adiposity of the wallet made it difficult to close.
